info.name: ZOHO MAIL _ fuk all the useless shit (AKA EvilBee)
info.description:
..Complex Dark ZOhO Mail Mods...  (V.2) 


- All the useless shit nobody uses that clutters the screen as been removed.

- CSS clearly detailed by sections so that you can easily modify or reactivate anything.

- Near everything has transparency or hover animations or was redesigned or moved around.

- Set your own background and main hue color.

- Everything is darkened, even context-menus and popups.

- Bonus Psychedelic Mode.

_
info.additionalInfo:
(thats Ver2, zoho changed and old one doesnt work correctly and for some reason i cant delete it)

-FREE FOR PERSONAL USE ONLY-

/*Copyright: mooshi*/
/*License: Personal use Only - feel free to donate to a charity of your choice on my behalf, like a chicken shelter or whatever.*/

--------

To have it setup exactly like the screenshot:

-Set "yellow-dark" in settings and activate Dark-Mode.
-Install "Roboto" fonts family (what gmail uses) and "moonhouse" (only used in boot screen)
-EvilBee user icon here (https://i.imgur.com/qdm8eIz.png)

_

screenshots:
https://i.imgur.com/9FDqRab.png
https://i.imgur.com/KZ4VRtK.png

https://i.imgur.com/Jw8OVuh.png
https://i.imgur.com/pej44S1.png
https://i.imgur.com/8Jbh7Ac.png
https://i.imgur.com/lEHaTOY.png
_


I suggest adding this code in your userchrome.css to auto-hide the navbar and tabs like mine.

--------
#navigator-toolbox {
position: relative !important;
overflow: hidden;
max-height: 14px !important;
}

#navigator-toolbox:hover {
transition: 300ms !important;
max-height: 87px !important;
}

#navigator-toolbox {
transition: 1000ms;
transition-delay: 2s !important;
}
--------
